# Keen Senses (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Alchemist Spells|Alchemist 1]], [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]], [[1st Level Elven Archer Spells|Elven archer 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 2]], [[BoXM 2nd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, M/DF (a hawkâ€™s feather)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 230

The subject gains a +2 competence bonus on [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] checks and gains [[S3.1G-M - Universal Monster Rules G-M (Bestiary 6 Apx)|low-light vision]]. Subjects that have [[S3.1G-M - Universal Monster Rules G-M (Bestiary 6 Apx)|low-light vision]] double the distance they can see under the effects of this spell.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Elven archer 1 to Level per New Paths Compendium (Kobold Press), pg. 20.
